19:15 <vmassol> abusenius: ping  
19:16 <vmassol> abusenius: we're wondering why you added a XMLEscapingValidator instead of just using the standard validator. Any idea?  
19:16 <OSIMasson> has quit  
19:16 <vmassol> (we found a bug with XMLEscapingValidator and we're now wondering if we need it at all)  
19:19 <tmortagne> vmassol: we do actually but what we don't need is this specific test (validating how document XM L is rendered)  
19:19 <tmortagne> this test is useful when we validate parameters but here we validate space name in the URL  
19:19 <tmortagne> actually space name in the XAR XML  
19:20 <tmortagne> which is already validated in various places  
19:20 <vmassol> k  
19:28 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
20:11 <abusenius> thanks for answering :)
